English: Click the drop down menu to select which measurement you would like to view.
Spanish: Ponle clic en el menú desplegable para seleccionar el variable preferido.

English: Click the drop down menu to select which year of data collection you would like to view.
Spanish: Ponle clic en el menú desplegable para seleccionar el año de colección de datos preferido.
